接口的使用
javax.servlet.ServletRegistration.Dynamic

  • 使用ServletRegistration.Dynamic的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet
    The javax.servlet package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.jasper.servlet  

    • javax.servlet中ServletRegistration.Dynamic的使用

      返回ServletRegistration.Dynamic的javax.servlet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ServletContext.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, Servlet servlet) 
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ServletContext.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.String className) 

    • org.apache.catalina.core中ServletRegistration.Dynamic的使用

      实现ServletRegistration.Dynamic的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ApplicationServletRegistration 
      返回ServletRegistration.Dynamic的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ApplicationContext.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.Class<? extends Servlet> servletClass)
      Add servlet to context.
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ApplicationContextFacade.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, Servlet servlet) 
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ApplicationContext.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, Servlet servlet)
      Add servlet to context.
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ApplicationContextFacade.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.String className) 
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic ApplicationContext.addServlet(java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.String servletClass)
      Add servlet to context.
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic StandardContext.dynamicServletAdded(Wrapper wrapper)
      hook to register that we need to scan for security annotations.
